dt: {bc}a mythical being of folklore and romance usually having diminutive human form and magic powers
used as a term of abuse and disparagement

et: Middle English {it}fairie{/it} fairyland, enchantment, from Anglo-French {it}faerie{/it}, from {it}fee{/it} fairy, from Latin {it}Fata{/it}, goddess of fate, from {it}fatum{/it} fate
shortdef: a mythical being of folklore and romance usually having diminutive human form and magic powers
a gay person —used as a term of abuse and disparagement

dt: {bc}a fairy believed by children to leave money while they sleep in exchange for a tooth that has come out

shortdef: a fairy believed by children to leave money while they sleep in exchange for a tooth that has come out
